PDFtodaay@gmail.com, DK +45 31 19 77 22

PDFtoday! strives to be a open nonacademic research and discussion forum for theory and philosophy. A discussion night takes place at the Gerrit Rietveld Academie each second Tuesday where participants are advised to read a text beforehand of the discussion evening.
